Application description
Episode 20: Stop! My App is On Fire!

The Pygmies discover fire with a little help from their god of course! Driftwood has landed on the island and the pygmies will stack them in a fire pit. Use lightning to ignite the fire. Pygmies will warm themselves on it. It is also good for cooking...

We are continuing the update but more complex updates are forcing us to take more time to get them right. Remember, your purchases keep us updating so spread the word! And updates are always FREE. For reviews and other info check out the Pocket Blog:
 
What kind of god would you be? Benevolent or vengeful? Play Pocket God and discover the answer within yourself. On a remote island, you are the all-powerful god that rules over the primitive islanders. You can bring new life, and then take it away just as quickly. Exercise your powers on the islanders. Lift them in the air, alter gravity, hit them with lightning...you're the island god! All god powers are demonstrated in Pocket God's help menu.

Pocket God is an episodic microgame for you to explore, show your friends and have fun with. We have been growing the game with the help of player suggestions! What sort of godly powers would you like to see added?

Possible future additions:
Changing Temperature
More Weapons
Huts or other structures
More hungry sea creatures
Visitors from afar

New in this version
The island now has Firewood that the pygmies will stack in a fire pit.
Once all the firewood is in place, strike the wood with lightning to create a fire. It can be used to cook (fish and/or pygmies) and the pygmies will warm themselves on it. Poke the fire and it flares up.

Requirements
Compatible with iPhone and iPod touch
Requires iPhone 2.2 Software Update
